resources.string: We have prepared a present for our customers who have loved us for a long time. Please enter simple information and check if you are eligible.
Disclaimer :\nThis is not an app that actually works and is not in operation with Sky UK Limited. Please be aware that you cannot actually win a prize even if a third party obtained it by accident.
Please select the channel you are currently subscribing to.
Please enter the account number of the Sky TV account you are subscribing to. (* It consists of 12 digits.)
